item.title: Starting a Blog
item.description: I have been trying to start blogging for a long time now. I wanted a website that was managed by me to publish my blog. Managing my own website would mean investing time in writing HTML, JS and CSS files as well. I thought it be cool if I can publish blogs without leaving my editor, and don’t have to write markup and styling. I wanted the blog to be more about writing rather than managing the post.
